applicationId.description: The ARN of the application from the Serverless Application Repository.

capabilities.description: A list of capabilities. Valid values are `CAPABILITY_IAM`, `CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM`, `CAPABILITY_RESOURCE_POLICY`, or `CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND`

name.description: The name of the stack to create. The resource deployed in AWS will be prefixed with `serverlessrepo-`

outputs.description: A map of outputs from the stack.

parameters.description: A map of Parameter structures that specify input parameters for the stack.

semanticVersion.description: The version of the application to deploy. If not supplied, deploys the latest version.

tags.description: A list of tags to associate with this stack. .If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.
